common.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome to Seline
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered creative companion. Let's get you set up in just a few steps.

agents.title: Custom AI Agents
agents.desc: Create specialized assistants with unique personalities and capabilities

tools.title: Powerful Tools
tools.desc: Generate images, search the web, analyze code, and more

memory.title: Persistent Memory
memory.desc: Your agents remember preferences and learn your workflow

provider.title: Choose Your AI Provider
provider.subtitle: Select how you want to power your AI agents

antigravity.title: Antigravity (Free)
antigravity.desc: Sign in with your Antigravity account for free access

anthropic.title: Anthropic
anthropic.desc: Use your own Claude API key for direct access

auth.title: Connect Your Account

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.hint: Your API key is stored locally and never sent to our servers

auth.skipHint: You can configure this later in Settings

personalization.title: Personalize Your Experience
personalization.subtitle: Help your agents understand your preferences (optional)

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.subtitle: Your workspace is ready. Here's what you can do next:

tips.agent: Create your first AI agent with custom personality
tips.chat: Start a conversation and explore capabilities

signup.title: Create an account
signup.subtitleFirst: Set up your first account to get started
signup.subtitle: Sign up to start creating
signup.firstUser: You're the first user! This account will be created locally.
signup.errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

picker.title: Choose an Agent
picker.subtitle: Select an agent to start chatting, or create a new one
picker.toolsEnabled: {count, plural, one {# tool enabled} other {# tools enabled}}
picker.empty: No agents yet. Configure your first agent to get started.
picker.emptyDescription: Agents are AI assistants tailored to specific tasks. Create one to get started with personalized help.
picker.searchPlaceholder: Search agents by name, purpose, or tools...

readFile.name: Read File
readFile.description: Read full file content from synced folders

localGrep.name: Local Grep
localGrep.description: Fast exact/regex pattern search with ripgrep

webBrowse.name: Web Browse
webBrowse.description: Fetch and analyze web pages with AI synthesis

firecrawlCrawl.name: Crawl Website
firecrawlCrawl.description: Crawl multiple pages from a website

editImage.name: Image Editor (Gemini)
editImage.description: Edit images, create variations, combine images

showProductImages.name: Product Gallery
showProductImages.description: Display products with images and purchase links

executeCommand.name: Execute Command
executeCommand.description: Run shell commands safely within synced directories

generateImageFlux2Flex.name: Generate (Flux.2 Flex)
generateImageFlux2Flex.description: Generate images with Flux.2 Flex via OpenRouter

editImageFlux2Flex.name: Edit (Flux.2 Flex)
editImageFlux2Flex.description: Edit one or more images with Flux.2 Flex via OpenRouter

generateImageGpt5Mini.name: Generate (GPT-5 Mini)
generateImageGpt5Mini.description: Fast image generation with GPT-5 Mini

editImageGpt5Mini.name: Edit (GPT-5 Mini)
editImageGpt5Mini.description: Quick editing of one or more images with GPT-5 Mini

editImageGpt5.name: Edit (GPT-5)
editImageGpt5.description: Premium editing of one or more images with GPT-5

referenceImageGpt5.name: Reference (GPT-5)
referenceImageGpt5.description: Premium style transfer with multiple reference images

editImageGemini25Flash.name: Edit (Gemini 2.5 Flash)
editImageGemini25Flash.description: Fast editing of one or more images with Gemini 2.5 Flash

editImageGemini3Pro.name: Edit (Gemini 3 Pro)
editImageGemini3Pro.description: Advanced editing of one or more images with Gemini 3 Pro

referenceImageGemini3Pro.name: Reference (Gemini 3 Pro)
referenceImageGemini3Pro.description: Advanced style transfer with multiple reference images

generateImageZImage.name: Generate (Z-Image Local)
generateImageZImage.description: Local image generation via ComfyUI (requires Docker)

generateImageFlux2Klein4B.name: Generate (FLUX.2 Klein 4B)
generateImageFlux2Klein4B.description: Fast local FLUX.2 Klein 4B image generation (requires Docker)

dialog.title: Avatar for {name}
dialog.subtitle: Select an existing image or upload a new avatar

error.invalidType: Please upload a PNG, JPEG, or WebP image

avatar.empty: No images yet. Upload one below.

welcome.start: How can I help you today?

enhance.minChars: Please enter at least 3 characters to enhance
enhance.selectAgent: Select an agent with synced folders to use enhancement
enhance.tooltipEnhanced: Enhanced with {files} files - click Send to use
enhance.tooltipDefault: Enhance with context from synced folders

folderSync.noFoldersDescription: Add folders to enable vector search for this agent
folderSync.folderPathTip: Tip: Copy the folder path from Finder (Cmd+Option+C) or Terminal
folderSync.largeFilesWillBeSkipped: large file(s) over 3000 lines will be skipped
folderSync.verifyLater: You can still add this folder - it will be verified when syncing.
folderSync.clickAddReminder: Click "Add Folder" to save this folder to the index
folderSync.reindexConfirm: This will rebuild the index for all folders and may take a while. Continue?
folderSync.reindexHint: Use after enabling V2 to rebuild lexical vectors.

intro.subtitle: Configure a focused AI agent for your work or projects
intro.quickPrompt: Describe your agent's role or purpose in one sentence:
intro.quickPlaceholder: Customer support agent for our SaaS product that answers FAQs and drafts replies.

name.question: What shall we call your agent?
name.label: Enter agent name:
name.errorMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
name.errorMaxLength: Name must be less than 50 characters

concept.question: Describe your agent's role, domain, and personality...
concept.label: Agent concept (role, domain, and how it should help you):
concept.placeholder: e.g., A wise mentor who guides heroes on their journey...
concept.example1: Customer support agent that answers FAQs and drafts email replies
concept.example2: Product research assistant that summarizes user interviews and feature requests
concept.example3: Technical writing agent that explains APIs in clear, simple language
concept.errorMinLength: Please describe your agent in at least 10 characters
concept.errorMaxLength: Concept must be less than 500 characters

identity.question: Define your agent's identity and purpose...
identity.purposePlaceholder: Describe what this agent does, its domain expertise, and how it should help users...
identity.errorNameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
identity.errorNameMax: Name must be less than 50 characters
identity.errorTaglineMax: Tagline must be less than 100 characters
identity.errorPurposeMin: Please describe the agent's purpose in at least 10 characters
identity.errorPurposeMax: Purpose must be less than 1000 characters

tools.describeImageDesc: Analyze and describe images using AI vision
tools.showProductImagesDesc: Display products with images and purchase links for shopping queries
tools.executeCommandDesc: Run shell commands safely within synced directories

tools.editImageFlux2FlexDesc: Edit one or more images using Flux.2 Flex via OpenRouter
tools.referenceImageFlux2FlexDesc: Style-guided generation with multiple reference images
tools.generateImageGpt5MiniDesc: Fast image generation with GPT-5 Mini
tools.editImageGpt5MiniDesc: Quick editing of one or more images with GPT-5 Mini

tools.editImageGpt5Desc: Premium editing of one or more images with GPT-5

tools.editImageGemini3ProDesc: Advanced editing of one or more images with Gemini 3 Pro

embeddingSetup.question: Choose an embedding provider and model.

openrouter.title: OpenRouter (Cloud)
openrouter.description: Use OpenRouter embeddings with your API key.

local.title: Local (On-device)
local.description: Run embeddings locally with bundled models.

mcpTools.title: MCP Tools
mcpTools.description: Select which MCP servers and tools to enable for this agent.
mcpTools.noServersDescription: Configure MCP servers in Settings → MCP Servers to enable external tools.
mcpTools.serversNotConnected: MCP servers are configured but not connected. Connect to discover available tools.

style.question: Choose a visual style for your agent...

knowledgeBase.question: Upload documents to build the agent's knowledge base...
knowledgeBase.skipHint: You can skip this step and add documents later

success.title: {name} is Ready!
success.subtitle: Your agent has been created successfully.

avatarEdit.title: Avatar for {name}
avatarEdit.subtitle: Review and customize your agent's avatar
avatarEdit.promptPlaceholder: Describe how this agent should look (professional, neutral, playful, etc.)...
avatarEdit.promptHint: Edit the prompt and regenerate to customize the avatar

errors.invalidFormat: Please upload a PNG, JPEG, or WebP image

errors.forbidden: You don't have access to this resource
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.genericRefresh: Something went wrong. Please refresh the page.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.description: Re-run the setup wizard to reconfigure your settings

memoryDefaults.title: Global Memory Defaults
memoryDefaults.description: Set default preferences that will be applied to all agents. These memories help your agents understand your preferences.
memoryDefaults.placeholder: e.g., "Always use TypeScript for code examples"
memoryDefaults.empty: No global memory defaults set. Add preferences to personalize your agents.

tavily.label: Tavily API Key
tavily.helper: Required for Deep Research web search

webScraperProvider.label: Web Scraping Provider
webScraperProvider.helper: Choose local scraping (bundled with the app) or Firecrawl cloud API

firecrawl.label: Firecrawl API Key
firecrawl.helper: Required for web scraping with Firecrawl

models.title: Model Selection
models.subtitle: Configure different models for different tasks. Leave empty to use provider defaults.

chat.label: Chat Model
chat.helper: Primary model for conversations. Examples: claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929, anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet, openai/gpt-4o

research.label: Research Model
research.helper: Model for Deep Research mode. Use a powerful model for best results.

vision.label: Vision Model
vision.helper: Model for image analysis (must support vision). Examples: claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929, google/gemini-2.0-flash-001

utility.label: Utility Model
utility.helper: Fast/cheap model used for background tasks (e.g., prompt enhancement). Example: google/gemini-2.0-flash-lite-001

embeddingProvider.label: Embedding Provider
embeddingProvider.helper: Choose between OpenRouter (cloud) or local models bundled with the app.

embedding.label: Embedding Model
embedding.helper: Model for document embeddings (via OpenRouter). Examples: text-embedding-3-small, text-embedding-3-large
embedding.helperLocal: Select a Transformers.js model for local embeddings. Download required for first use.

embeddingLocalPath.label: Local Model Path
embeddingLocalPath.helper: Directory containing model folders (e.g., C:\models with Xenova/bge-large-en-v1.5 inside). Leave empty to allow cached downloads.

tip.title: Tip:
tip.body: Use cheaper/faster models for embeddings and more powerful models for research. OpenRouter model IDs use the format: provider/model-name (e.g., anthropic/claude-3.5-sonnet).

vector.title: Vector Search (LanceDB)
vector.subtitle: Enable vector search to allow agents to search through indexed folders using semantic similarity. This uses LanceDB, an embedded vector database that runs locally.
vector.enabled: Vector search is enabled. You can configure which folders to index for each agent in the agent's settings or during agent creation.

reindexRequired.title: Reindex.
reindexRequired.body: Choose if you wanna force reindexing of all folders. Embedding settings changes. Reindex all synced folders to rebuild vectors with a new model.

v2.title: V2 Features
v2.subtitle: Enable hybrid search, token chunking, and tuning for improved retrieval quality.
v2.maxFileLinesHelper: Files exceeding this line count will be skipped during indexing (default: 3000)
v2.maxLineLengthHelper: Files containing any line exceeding this character count will be skipped (checks for base64/massive strings, default: 1000)

advanced.title: Advanced Vector Settings
advanced.description: Fine-tune retrieval behavior, chunking, reranking, and file limits.

hybridSearch.title: Hybrid Search
hybridSearch.description: Combine dense and lexical search for better recall.

chunking.title: Token Chunking
chunking.description: Split documents into token-aware chunks for better retrieval.

reranking.title: Reranking
reranking.description: Rerank top results with an ONNX model for higher precision.

fileLimits.title: File Limits
fileLimits.description: Skip files that are too large or contain extreme lines.
fileLimits.maxLinesHelper: Files exceeding this line count will be skipped during indexing (default: 3000)
fileLimits.maxLineLengthHelper: Files with any line exceeding this character count will be skipped (default: 1000)

toolLoading.label: Tool Loading Mode
toolLoading.deferredHelper: Saves tokens. Agent discovers tools via searchTools when needed.
toolLoading.alwaysHelper: All tools available immediately. Uses more tokens per request.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Credits, support, and links
about.headline: Released and developed with the support of Styly
about.byline: Created and maintained by Umut Tan

empty.description: We couldn't load this agent chat. The agent may not exist or you may not have access.

usage.title: Usage & Analytics
usage.subtitle: Track token usage, tool calls, and media generation for your chat sessions.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.empty: No sessions yet. Start a chat to see usage analytics.
sessions.select: Select a session on the left to see detailed usage and analytics.

tools.title: Tools
tools.empty: No tools were used in this session.

media.title: Media generation
media.empty: No images or videos were generated in this session.

form.title: Add Memory
form.placeholder: e.g., User prefers 16:9 aspect ratio for all video content
form.hint: Be specific and actionable. This will be injected into the agent's system prompt.

empty.title: No memories yet
empty.pending: No pending memories to review. Memories are automatically extracted from conversations.
empty.approved: No approved memories. Approve pending memories or add them manually.
empty.all: Memories are automatically extracted from conversations. You can also add them manually.

errors.forbidden: You don't have access to this agent

visual_preferences.label: Visual Preferences
visual_preferences.description: Colors, styles, aesthetics, aspect ratios, design preferences

communication_style.label: Communication Style
communication_style.description: Tone, formality, language preferences, response format

workflow_patterns.label: Workflow Patterns
workflow_patterns.description: User habits, iteration patterns, tool sequences

observability.title: Observability Dashboard
observability.subtitle: Monitor agent runs, tool executions, and performance metrics
